philosophers-stone.name: Philosopher's Stone
philosophers-stone.description:
The energy concealed within the Artifact hugely enhances the capabilities of Vassals.
A pipe-shaped object comprised of mysterious metal parts, seemingly from another era. The Tempus Church created this at great cost to achieve time travel.

skills.name: Leakage
skills.description: Upon CRIT Hit, fires 4 bullets at the target, dealing <style=Highlight>{0}</style> ATK (M. DMG). Cooldown: {1} sec.
skills.descriptionFormatted: Upon CRIT Hit, fires 4 bullets at the target, dealing 300%~450% ATK (M. DMG). Cooldown: 6 sec.

explorationSkills.name: Decoy
explorationSkills.description: Creates a 5x5 Illusion in any unoccupied grid within a 7x7 rectangle around self.

explorationSkills.name: Temporal Rupture
explorationSkills.description: Casts Celestial Rift on any unit within an 11x11 rectangle around self, killing them instantly.

silvershadow-chronometer.name: Silvershadow Chronometer
silvershadow-chronometer.description:
The energy concealed within the Artifact hugely enhances the capabilities of Vassals.
A small metal dial with circular scales and two needles marking the cycle of day and night. Only Ancestral Nobles and esteemed Church members could possess such a gadget in ancient times.

skills.name: Collapse
skills.description: When a summon dies or disappears, restores <style=Highlight>{0}</style> Max HP. Cooldown: {1} sec.
skills.descriptionFormatted: When a summon dies or disappears, restores 10%~15% Max HP. Cooldown: 10 sec.

skills.name: Accelerate
skills.description: When a summon appears, recovers <style=Highlight>{0}</style> Bloodsoul. Can only trigger once every {1} sec.
skills.descriptionFormatted: When a summon appears, recovers 1~1.2 Bloodsoul. Can only trigger once every 20 sec.

eye-of-truth.name: Eye of Truth
eye-of-truth.description:
The energy concealed within the Artifact hugely enhances the capabilities of Vassals.
A perplexing cylindrical structure employed by the Tempus Church to gaze into the void located at the end of the world.

skills.name: Guard
skills.description: Basic ATK has a(n) <style=Highlight>{0}</style> chance of granting ATK SPD Up (Minor) for {1} sec.
skills.descriptionFormatted: Basic ATK has a(n) 15%~25% chance of granting ATK SPD Up (Minor) for 10 sec.

explorationSkills.name: Veil of the Bat
explorationSkills.description: Movement Skill: Transforms into a bat that is capable of passing through low walls and crates, avoiding enemy sight.

explorationSkills.name: Roche Limit
explorationSkills.description: Applies Gravitational Force to units in line, drawing them close.

poseidons-skull.name: Poseidon's Skull
poseidons-skull.description:
The energy concealed within the Artifact hugely enhances the capabilities of Vassals.
A certain circular device worn on the head which is made of heavy metal to assist divers underwater. The Tempus Church's expeditionary forces had relied on this device to explore ancient civilizations beneath the sea.

skills.name: Amplify
skills.description: Deals <style=Highlight>{0}</style> increased DMG to enemies under debuff or Control effects.
skills.descriptionFormatted: Deals 10%~15% increased DMG to enemies under debuff or Control effects.

skills.name: Reacclimate
skills.description: When applying Control or Debuff effects, deals an additional <style=Highlight>{0}</style> ATK (M. DMG) to the target. Cooldown: {1} sec.
skills.descriptionFormatted: When applying Control or Debuff effects, deals an additional 325%~480% ATK (M. DMG) to the target. Cooldown: 10 sec.

fruit-of-immortality.name: Fruit of Immortality
fruit-of-immortality.description: The energy concealed within the Artifact hugely enhances the capabilities of Vassals.Transparent liquid in a glass container that resists death. Used by the Tempus Church to heal soldiers during the Holy War against the Bloodborn, it earned the title of "Immortality.

skills.name: Relief
skills.description: When HP percentage falls below {0} for the first time, restores <style=Highlight>{1}</style> of Max HP every sec for {2} sec.
skills.descriptionFormatted: When HP percentage falls below 50% for the first time, restores 4%~6% of Max HP every sec for 10 sec.

skills.name: Soothe
skills.description: When targeted by {0} or more enemies, reduces All DMG Taken by <style=Highlight>{1}</style>.
skills.descriptionFormatted: When targeted by 3 or more enemies, reduces All DMG Taken by 15%~25%.

explorationSkills.name: Temporal Dislocation
explorationSkills.description: Applies Temporal Dislocation to any unit, returning them to their original position and orientation at the beginning of the current round (status effects remain unchanged).

explorationSkills.name: Inverted Clock
explorationSkills.description: Aiona traverses different timelines by using the Inverted Clock. It can be activated multiple times.

explorationSkills.name: Regeneration Clock
explorationSkills.description: Use the Regeneration Clock to alter the tree's growth.

explorationSkills.name: Inverted Clock
explorationSkills.description: Aiona traverses different timelines by using the Inverted Clock. It can be activated multiple times.

explorationSkills.name: Regeneration Clock
explorationSkills.description: Use the Regeneration Clock to alter the tree's growth.

cage-of-the-invisible-nightingale.name: Cage of the Invisible Nightingale
cage-of-the-invisible-nightingale.description:
The energy concealed within the Artifact hugely enhances the capabilities of Vassals.
Beneath the wooden casing lie numerous intricate components, so finely crafted that few possesses the skill to replicate them. Rumor has it that some have heard the song of a nightingale coming from inside, capable of swiftly revitalizing one's spirit.

skills.name: Harmony
skills.description: When the battle begins, gain 2 Nightingales. Each time Healing is dealt, the Nightingales will restore HP equal to <style=Highlight>{1}</style> of ATK to allies with HP below {0}.
skills.descriptionFormatted: When the battle begins, gain 2 Nightingales. Each time Healing is dealt, the Nightingales will restore HP equal to 360%~540% of ATK to allies with HP below 50%.

skills.name: Faint Song
skills.description: Gains 1 Nightingale every {0} sec, up to a maximum of {1} Nightingales.
skills.descriptionFormatted: Gains 1 Nightingale every 12~8 sec, up to a maximum of 3 Nightingales.

soul-binding-reliquary.name: Soul-binding Reliquary
soul-binding-reliquary.description:
The energy concealed within the Artifact hugely enhances the capabilities of Vassals.
A square frame with intricate parts that came from the East. Craftsmen have tried to build it, but had their souls stolen, falling into eternal sleep upon its creation.

skills.name: Imaging
skills.description: Deals <style=Highlight>{0}</style> increased DMG to enemies with Continuous DMG effects.
skills.descriptionFormatted: Deals 10%~15% increased DMG to enemies with Continuous DMG effects.

peacemaker.name: Peacemaker
peacemaker.description:
The energy concealed within the Artifact can hugely enhance the combat abilities of Vassals.
Forged in black iron, its heat clings to the skin, like the heartbeat of sin itself. Sparks ignite the powder within, and the abyss answers with a roar.

skills.name: Overheat
skills.description: After casting Ultimate, increases CRIT DMG by up to <style=Highlight>{0}</style> based on the number of Bloodsoul consumed, lasting {1} sec.
skills.descriptionFormatted: After casting Ultimate, increases CRIT DMG by up to 30%~50% based on the number of Bloodsoul consumed, lasting 10 sec.

200101.name: Decoy
200101.description: Creates a 5x5 Illusion in any unoccupied grid within a 7x7 rectangle around self.

200102.name: Temporal Rupture
200102.description: Casts Celestial Rift on any unit within an 11x11 rectangle around self, killing them instantly.

200301.name: Veil of the Bat
200301.description: Movement Skill: Transforms into a bat that is capable of passing through low walls and crates, avoiding enemy sight.

200302.name: Roche Limit
200302.description: Applies Gravitational Force to units in line, drawing them close.

200401.name: Temporal Dislocation
200401.description: Applies Temporal Dislocation to any unit, returning them to their original position and orientation at the beginning of the current round (status effects remain unchanged).

200402.name: Temporal Paradox
200402.description: Creates a 3x3 Time Freeze in any unoccupied space within a 7x7 rectangle around self, petrifying targets in the area for 1 round.

200501.name: Chain Reaction
200501.description: Fires an arrow in a straight line that will eliminate the first unit hit and ignite all torches along its path.

200502.name: Distracting Shot
200502.description: Distraction: Fires an arrow at select location, forcing nearby enemies to face that direction.

201301.name: Spectral Leap
201301.description: Movement Skill: Crosses over low walls within 1 tile.

201302.name: Void Monolith
201302.description: Creates a stone tablet on 1 tile that blocks both vision and movement.

204001.name: Crime
204001.description: Fires a bullet in a straight line, eliminating the first unit hit.

204002.name: Punishment
204002.description: Fires a bullet in a straight line, eliminating the first unit hit.

206101.name: Inverted Clock
206101.description: Aiona traverses different timelines by using the Inverted Clock. It can be activated multiple times.

206102.name: Regeneration Clock
206102.description: Use the Regeneration Clock to alter the tree's growth.

206103.name: Inverted Clock
206103.description: Aiona traverses different timelines by using the Inverted Clock. It can be activated multiple times.

206104.name: Regeneration Clock
206104.description: Use the Regeneration Clock to alter the tree's growth.

999.name: Soli
999.description:
The currency used for all transactions across Minexus. Made from precious metal, it is stamped with a seal representing the Church's "gift of justice and order."
Introduced as the standard currency following the Tempus Church's unification of the continent, these coins were minted from tamper-proof "Liquid Gold" by the legendary alchemist Albrecht, Sage of Holy Water. His technique represented a crystallization of wisdom far beyond the limitations of his era.

900001.name: Philosopher's Stone Blueprint
900001.description:
Used to enhance the Future Artifact "Philosopher's Stone." Though under ownership of the Church, it has somehow fallen into civilian hands.
Delineated with intricate patterns and geometric lattices, it depicts an artifact fitted with strange metal parts, seemingly from another era. The Tempus Church created this at great costs to achieve the power of time travel.

900002.name: Silvershadow Chronometer Blueprint
900002.description:
Used to enhance the Future Artifact "Silvershadow Chronometer." Though under ownership of the Church, it has somehow fallen into civilian hands.
Delineated with intricate patterns and geometric lattices, it depicts a small metal dial with circular scales and two needles marking the cycle of day and night. Only Ancestral Nobles and esteemed Tempus Church members could possess such a gadget in ancient times.

900003.name: Eye of Truth Blueprint
900003.description:
Used to enhance the Future Artifact "Eye of Truth." Though under ownership of the Church, it has somehow fallen into civilian hands.
Delineated with intricate patterns and geometric lattices, it depicts a perplexing cylindrical structure. Employed by the Tempus Church to gaze into the void located at the end of the world.

900004.name: Poseidon's Skull Blueprint
900004.description:
Used to enhance the Future Artifact "Poseidon's Skull." Though under ownership of the Church, it has somehow fallen into civilian hands.
Delineated with intricate patterns and geometric lattices, it seems to be some kind of circular device worn on the head. Though it is just a drawing, one can already sense its weight.

900005.name: Fruit of Immortality Blueprint
900005.description:
Used to enhance the Future Artifact "Fruit of Immortality." Though under ownership of the Church, it has somehow fallen into civilian hands.
Delineated with intricate patterns and geometric lattices, it depicts transparent liquid in a glass container that resists death. Used by the Tempus Church to heal soldiers during the Holy War against the Bloodborn, it earned the title of "Immortality.

900006.name: Nightingale's Cage Blueprint
900006.description:
Used to enhance the Future Artifact "Nightingale's Invisible Cage." Though under ownership of the Church, it has somehow fallen into civilian hands.
Delineated with intricate patterns and geometric lattices, it depicts a wooden casing so intricate that likely no one could reproduce it. Rumor has it that someone once heard the song of a nightingale coming from inside.

900007.name: Soul-binding Reliquary Blueprint
900007.description:
Used to enhance the Future Artifact "Soul-binding Reliquary." Though under ownership of the Church, it has somehow fallen into civilian hands.
Delineated with intricate patterns and geometric lattices, it depicts a square frame with intricate parts that came from the East. Craftsmen have tried to build it, but had their souls stolen, falling into eternal sleep upon its creation.

900008.name: Peacemaker Blueprint
900008.description:
A blueprint intentionally left by a future messenger. Use to enhance the Future Artifact "Peacemaker."
Marked by intricate patterns and geometric lattices, the blueprint tempted smiths to forge its likeness. Yet, the moment they succeeded, they were engulfed by the flames of this malevolent construct.
